roleset.name: be suitable or appriate for something.

example.name: Befitting
example.text: He called the Arab leaders *PRO* to take a stand "befitting the sacrifices" of the Palestinian people.
example.arg: the sacrifices" of the Palestinian people.

roleset.note: BEFIT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'befit' based on ebn instances.frame by Perryn (from befit.01-v predicate notes)
